title: Macrophage participation in the hepatic response to acute CNS injury.
abstractText: We are committed to improving public engagement in science and we will ensure that work carried under under this proposal will be communicated to those outside the scientific community. We have established a web site to disseminate details of our research (www.pharm.ox.ac.uk). If the application is successful, the lay summary will be placed on the web sites, which will be updated as the milestones are reached. We have given, and will be giving, public lectures on the theme of this proposal, we are also involved in a local Schools science programme, and we will release items about our work to the Oxford University Press Office after they have been published in peer-reviewed journals.
